title: AT FONSEKA VISIT MAHANAYAKA THERO SAYS RULERS MUST FOLLOW DASARAJA DHARMA
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana As a strong message to the politicians who govern the country, the most venerable Agga Maha Panditha   the Supreme Maha Nayaka of the Sri Lanka Amarapura Sangha Sabha  Dauldena Gnanissara said that  “Dasa Raja Dharma” should be practiced by rulers when the former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka visited him…
